creator: rmager@vgkk.com
text:
Lynx reports the following for all of our servlets on Tomcat: 

Accept invalid cookie path=/mojo as a prefix of '/'? (n)


This is a cookie comming from Tomcat, not our servlet.
What version of lynx ? Does it happens for all requests ? Do you have any special option on lynx ? ( I use lynx quite often, never saw this one )
creator: cmanolache@yahoo.com
